sentences.sentence: Candle... you said it. What do you want?
Fine, I’ll talk. But only because you said the word.
I’m here every afternoon during the week. I like my peace, but I’m around.
And weekends? You can always find me here. No exceptions.
You should know that I don’t like being bothered, but you’ve caught my attention.
I don’t mind answering your questions, but you’d better make it worth my while.
There’s not much more to say—if you need me, afternoons or weekends, I’m here.
Don’t waste my time, and I’ll tell you what you need to know.
